A careless admin used overlapping primes for two RSA public keys. An intercepted message: ciphertext1: 649487694372910311760286990646184686206546644115106357817079461763810710416896173813153456919973742347302163161719473651590719832403064588210032194351935, ciphertext2: 1925447007221976791993817776483585114033796924831659660492116479794419634484147208954090337517482235915352667545589478977520059117183073850558524561094822. Can you recover the plaintext?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10062966529232649018312201773634048375552929123750940051078917790385830781388145018953849637601844841319552623776893239440154133781084081645062399100960489, n2=10890976787010940473461487890828358721749525191656385412700391155107202007210810260191036175964914776977116383066379494697230890201821202395040773043057501, e=4365939584073001787717528077419547524910245568334465040330129045565441980866825339208486577318380324835241852864580898012996304323819128562362860425638071

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{upo8f4sd}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 649487694372910311760286990646184686206546644115106357817079461763810710416896173813153456919973742347302163161719473651590719832403064588210032194351935, ciphertext2: 1925447007221976791993817776483585114033796924831659660492116479794419634484147208954090337517482235915352667545589478977520059117183073850558524561094822
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10062966529232649018312201773634048375552929123750940051078917790385830781388145018953849637601844841319552623776893239440154133781084081645062399100960489, n2=10890976787010940473461487890828358721749525191656385412700391155107202007210810260191036175964914776977116383066379494697230890201821202395040773043057501, e=4365939584073001787717528077419547524910245568334465040330129045565441980866825339208486577318380324835241852864580898012996304323819128562362860425638071
extra_info: p=105540547250113025401247201223859900424073992899611472817015723274295555519859, q=95346923920956572394297010701269223762394100384942339010889565279368950219571, r=114224731529248439843476194885645439494991578893201670789676265607844614614831, φ(n1)=10062966529232649018312201773634048375552929123750940051078917790385830781387944131482678568004049297107627494652706771346869579969256176356508734595221060, φ(n2)=10890976787010940473461487890828358721749525191656385412700391155107202007210600688535585970952677003771529468403122109017952746192020636564153559478223100
